SEARCH
Package fr.paymybuddy.service

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
fr.paymybuddy.service.UserService
@Service public class UserService extends Object
Service class that manages user-related operations.

This service handles user management functionality including user retrieval, creation, updates, friend relationships, and balance operations.

      Returns:
      the user with the specified email
      Throws:
      UserNotFondExeption - if no user is found with the given email

      public void saveNewUser(fr.paymybuddy.model.User user)

      This method encodes the user's password before saving.

      Parameters:
      user - the new user to save

      Merges updated user information into an existing user entity.

      This method only updates fields that have valid new values.

      Parameters:
      existingUser - the existing user entity to update
      updateDTO - DTO containing the fields to update
      Returns:
      the updated user entity

    • getFriends

      @Transactional public List<fr.paymybuddy.dto.UserFriendResponseDTO> getFriends(Long userId)
      Retrieves a list of friends for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose friends should be retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of DTOs containing information about the user's friends
      Throws:
      UserNotFondExeption - if the user is not found

    • addFriend

      @Transactional public void addFriend(Long userId, Long friendId)
      Adds a bidirectional friend relationship between two users.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the first user
      friendId - the ID of the second user to add as a friend
      Throws:
      DuplicateResourceException - if the friend relationship already exists

    • deleteFriend

      @Transactional public void deleteFriend(Long userId, Long friendId)
      Removes a bidirectional friend relationship between two users.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the first user
      friendId - the ID of the second user to remove from friends
      Throws:
      ContactAlreadyExistException - if the friend relationship doesn't exist

    • updateBalance

      @Transactional public void updateBalance(fr.paymybuddy.model.User sender, fr.paymybuddy.model.User reciver, double amount)
      Transfers money from one user to another.

      Updates the balance of both the sender and receiver after validating that the operation is legitimate.

      Parameters:
      sender - the user sending the money
      reciver - the user receiving the money
      amount - the amount to transfer
      Throws:
      InsufficientBalanceException - if the sender has insufficient balance or the amount is not positive
      SelfSendingAmountException - if the sender and receiver are the same user

    • addBalance

      @Transactional public void addBalance(fr.paymybuddy.model.User user, double amount)
      Adds funds to a user's balance.
      Parameters:
      user - the user whose balance will be increased
      amount - the amount to add
      Throws:
      InsufficientBalanceException - if the amount is not positive
